It is characterized by its small, evergreen leaves that are typically elliptical in shape and have a glossy surface. The plant produces small, bell-shaped flowers that are usually pink or white in color, which bloom in late spring to early summer. Due to its rarity and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a conservation concern in its native range.
